title: Historical Battle of Lodi: Charge of the Grenadiers - Napoleon Total War Gameplay
description:
Today we have an Online battle in Napoleon Total War.  This is a 2v2 historical battle of Lodi.  The battle was a decisive French victory against the Austrians in 1796.  But will can the Austrian players change history and achieve victory?  Enjoy the Battle :D

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
